snippet: A new exhibition at the Metropolitan Museum of Art opening Monday gives a view of the life of Sara Berman, who was the mother of Maira Kalman, the irreverent artist, book author and illustrator....

headline.main: Fed Vice Chair Joins Effort to Flag Pending Rate Hike
headline.print_headline: Fed Vice Chair Joins Effort to Flag Pending Rate Hike

lead_paragraph: A new exhibition at the Metropolitan Museum of Art opening Monday gives a view of the life of Sara Berman, who was the mother of Maira Kalman, the irreverent artist, book author and illustrator.
